name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_224Ra
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Ra" means the element "radium" and "224Ra" is the isotope "radium-224" with a half-life of 3.65e+00 days.
